code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''});const handleChange=e=>{setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSignup=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/signup',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(form)});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){navigate('/login');}else{alert(data.message||'Signup failed');}}catch(err){console.error(err);alert('Signup error');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSignup,className:"bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Name",value:form.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true,className:"w-full mb-4 p-2 border rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:form.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true,className:"w-full mb-4 p-2 border rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:form.password,onChange:handleChange,required:true,className:"w-full mb-4 p-2 border rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-teal-500 text-white py-2 rounded hover:bg-teal-600",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-center mt-4",children:["Already have an account?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/login'),className:"text-blue-600 hover:underline",children:"Log In"})]})]})});};export default Signup;
